# Aufgabe

Fitten Sie ein Polynomial-Modell für folgende Modellgleichung:

`body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm`.

Gesucht ist der RMSE im Test-Set (optimal hinsichtlich minimalem Prognosefehler).

Hinweise:

- Datensatz `penguins` (palmerpenguins)
- Verwenden Sie Tidymodels
- Fitten Sie Polynome des Grades 1 bis 10.
- Definieren Sie die Polynomegrade als Tuningparameter.
- Entfernen Sie fehlende Werte in den Prädiktoren.
- Wie immer gilt: Verwenden Sie die Standardeinstellungen der Funktionen, soweit nicht anders angegeben.






</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung


Setup:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_479fd7f0318ed1ef06fd2534d58aef78'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidymodels)
data(penguins, package = "palmerpenguins")
```
:::



Datenaufteilung:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_d369d6b43691f74e48904c2010cd089c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d_split <- initial_split(penguins)
d_train <- training(d_split)
d_test <- testing(d_split)
```
:::




Rezept:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_d2775b5bd27daec013baa04fd89c5f08'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rec1 <- 
  recipe(body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm, data = penguins) %>% 
  step_naomit(all_predictors()) %>% 
  step_poly(all_predictors(), degree = tune()) %>% 
  update_role(contains("_poly_"), new_role = "predictor")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: No columns were selected in `update_role()`.
```


:::
:::




Check:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_98f6d59f112792fc2dd12b3ec566a494'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d_baked <- bake(prep(rec1), new_data = NULL)
```
:::



Rezepte mit Tuningparametern kann man nicht preppen/backen.



Workflow:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_69fb297c8f9db870bf9540185fb5a849'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf1 <-
  workflow() %>% 
  add_model(linear_reg()) %>% 
  add_recipe(rec1)
```
:::






Tuning:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_edcc442e4508d060dd2c4183758cd292'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(42)
tune1 <-
  tune_grid(
    wf1,
    resamples = vfold_cv(data = penguins),
    metrics = metric_set(rmse),
    grid = grid_regular(degree(range = c(1, 10)),
                               levels = 10),
    control = control_grid(save_workflow = TRUE)
  )
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_4f1432e1f900fab726d0c0f6c2916a5a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
autoplot(tune1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){fig-pos='H' width=384}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_0ea522a17f7b8a1da10c1feb6e4db739'}

```{.r .cell-code}
show_best(tune1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 5 × 7
  degree .metric .estimator  mean     n std_err .config              
   <dbl> <chr>   <chr>      <dbl> <int>   <dbl> <chr>                
1      2 rmse    standard    638.    10    22.7 Preprocessor02_Model1
2      4 rmse    standard    641.    10    23.7 Preprocessor04_Model1
3      1 rmse    standard    643.    10    21.8 Preprocessor01_Model1
4      5 rmse    standard    643.    10    23.5 Preprocessor05_Model1
5      3 rmse    standard    643.    10    24.2 Preprocessor03_Model1
```


:::
:::


Finalisieren:



::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_98de8fcf5b6ef78c1f76af21ea4e978f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
best1 <- fit_best(tune1)
best1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
══ Workflow [trained] ══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
Preprocessor: Recipe
Model: linear_reg()

── Preprocessor ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
2 Recipe Steps

• step_naomit()
• step_poly()

── Model ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

Call:
stats::lm(formula = ..y ~ ., data = data)

Coefficients:
          (Intercept)  bill_length_mm_poly_1  bill_length_mm_poly_2  
                 4202                   8813                  -1708  
```


:::
:::


Predicten:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_e58dab5dc4450678bf22359d3d2e1930'}

```{.r .cell-code}
final1 <- last_fit(best1, d_split)
collect_metrics(final1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  .metric .estimator .estimate .config             
  <chr>   <chr>          <dbl> <chr>               
1 rmse    standard     666.    Preprocessor1_Model1
2 rsq     standard       0.287 Preprocessor1_Model1
```


:::
:::




Oder so:


::: {.cell hash='tidymodels-poly02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_5996cdda1f84704230fdc87b6ca2ee44'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sol <- 
predict(best1, new_data = d_test) %>% 
  bind_cols(d_test) %>% 
  rmse(truth = body_mass_g, estimate = .pred) %>% 
  pull(.estimate) %>% 
  pluck(1)

sol
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 657.5297
```


:::
:::






Die Antwort lautet: 657.5296534.
